description: This header file defines a template interface IIteratorType within the WPEFramework::RPC namespace. It declares an abstract interface for iteration mechanisms over elements of type ELEMENT, including methods for moving to next and previous elements, resetting position, validation, counting, and retrieving the current element.

classes.name: IIteratorType
classes.description: A template interface for iterator operations over a collection of ELEMENTS, providing methods for traversal, validation, and access.

methods.name: Next
methods.description: Advances the iterator to the next element, outputs it via reference.

methods.name: Previous
methods.description: Moves the iterator to the previous element, outputs it via reference.

methods.name: Reset
methods.description: Resets the iterator to a specific position.

methods.name: IsValid
methods.description: Checks if the current position of the iterator is valid.

methods.name: Count
methods.description: Returns the total number of elements.

methods.name: Current
methods.description: Returns the current element the iterator points to.
